I am an associate professor of sociology at [University of Oregon](https://www.uoregon.edu/). I am the co-editor of [*Socius*](https://journals.sagepub.com/home/srd) and [*The Oxford Handbook of Social Networks*](https://academic.oup.com/edited-volume/34294). My work has appeared in *PNAS*, *Social Forces*, *Annual Review of Sociology*, *Social Networks*, among numerous others. I research and teach courses on social networks, research methods, social theory, as well as culture & science.

You can find my CV [here](rl_4_11_2023.pdf).
